JDBC_PING.initialize_sql: CREATE TABLE JGROUPSPING ( own_addr varchar(200) NOT NULL, bind_addr varchar(200) NOT NULL, created timestamp NOT NULL, cluster_name varchar(200) NOT NULL, ping_data blob, constraint PK_JGROUPSPING PRIMARY KEY (own_addr, cluster_name) )
JDBC_PING.insert_single_sql: INSERT INTO JGROUPSPING (own_addr, bind_addr, created, cluster_name, ping_data) values (?, '${jgroups.tcp.address:127.0.0.1}',sysdate(), ?, ?)
JDBC_PING.delete_single_sql: DELETE FROM JGROUPSPING WHERE own_addr=? AND cluster_name=?
JDBC_PING.select_all_pingdata_sql: SELECT ping_data FROM JGROUPSPING WHERE cluster_name=?
